'''Could All Uninvolved Machinery Please Leave Immediately?''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Perpetual Mechanical Array]] without defeating any of its Ruin Sentinels.

This achievement is done by damaging the Perpetual Mechanical Array until the Ruin Sentinels appear, then dodging the Ruin Sentinels (without destroying the Enhanced Ruin Sentinel) until the Sentinels return to the boss and the Array can be damaged again.
